de.pniehus.jalienfx

Class FXZone

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.pniehus.jalienfx.FXZone

  • public class FXZone
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all information for an AlienFX light zone.
    Author:
    Phil Niehus
